name: Epic Fwog
description: Some Monsters love to be held, others just long to hold. Epic Fwog enjoys both! A diehard romantic just like its Common and Rare cousins, the Epic Fwog hopes to impress potential mates with the strength of its snuggles. It can also deliver a mean high-four!
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 7 hr, Enhanced Time: 5 hr 15 min
